property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is your devotion to white. If damage is prevented this way, Acolyte's Reward deals that much damage to any target. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shields up, spears out, heels set, hearts firm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Skyguard, put a +1/+1 counter on Akroan Skyguard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trust me. When you have earned a god's favor, you'll know."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have first strike. Creatures your opponents control lose first strike and can't have or gain first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It has been my experience that soldiers most fervently follow generals who lead by example." - Elspeth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever Brimaz, King of Oreskos attacks, create a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance that's attacking. Whenever Brimaz blocks a creature, create a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance that's blocking that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand. • Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The numbers of Nyxborn among us have swelled. Is this a sign of the gods' favor, or does it portend something else?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {2}{W}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Eidolon of Countless Battles and enchanted creature each get +1/+1 for each creature you control and +1/+1 for each Aura you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Elite Skirmisher, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some adopted the tactics of the leonin to combat the ferocity of the minotaurs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{1}{W}, {T}: You gain 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Civilization is the sum of Ephara's gifts." - Olexa of the Twelve

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The demon had flown past the reach of Erebos's whip but not the point of the sun god's spear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures and planeswalkers. If it's your turn, scry 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {5}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has double strike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap X target creatures. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Better to be beneath Heliod's notice than beneath his heel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever God-Favored General becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, create two 1/1 white Soldier enchantment creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Someone had to be first to attack, but he was not alone for long.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The great hart stood like a statue, its hide painted gold by the dawn. The Champion laid down her weapons and stepped forward within an arm's length of the beast. The hart, sacred to Heliod and bathed in the god's own light, bowed to the Champion, marking her as the Chosen of the Sun God. - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Griffin Dreamfinder enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some griffins are able to pluck mystic auras from the Æther that are hidden from other mortals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Aura spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of Iroas, put a +1/+1 counter on Hero of Iroas.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My left has felled a cyclops. My right has slain a giant. I bring both to every fight."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was Daeron's bravery that brought him to Odunos. But it was the magic of Meletis that brought him home.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Loyal Pegasus can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even if I should die in the saddle, she will not let me fall to the ground." - Hypatia of the Winged Horse

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such deeds should be common fare for such as us." - Anax, king of Akros

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {2}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Meletis, the walls have ears. In Akros, they have blades.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever Oreskos Sun Guide becomes untapped, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the humans have their pantheon. We need no gods to thrive. Even a mortal such as I can capture a part of the sun's power."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When Ornitharch enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two enchantment cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Theros, the dove is a symbol not of peace but of discovery. Quick wings herald the arrival of a revelation.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will come a time when the gods will look at mortals and shudder." - Uremides the philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Silent Sentinel attacks, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It serves a justice higher than the whims of the gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player can't draw more than one card each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Students at the Dekatia Academy learn that being sent to study with her is a lesson in itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was not chosen for my faith in the gods. Sometimes the gods must put their faith in us." - Elspeth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Vanguard of Brimaz, create a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The humans and their gods never blessed me. Only the pride deserves my allegiance."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever Aerie Worshippers becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, create a 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They can conjure stars from a clear sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Inspired - Whenever Arbiter of the Ideal becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library. If it's an artifact, creature, or land card, you may put it onto the battlefield with a manifestation counter on it. That permanent is an enchantment in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have flying. Creatures your opponents control lose flying and can't have or gain flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it not the embodiment of our aspirations?" - Prokopios, astronomer of Meletis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Chorus of the Tides, scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains protection from creatures your opponents control until end of turn. Untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tritons borrow the camouflage of their oceanic prey to become predators on land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever Deepwater Hypnotist becomes untapped, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch the waves too long, and you may never look away." - Meletian proverb

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ask of Keranos that you may understand the stars that mark your destiny. Implore Erebos that you may accept the fate thus divulged."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Eternity Snare enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{1}{U}, {T}: Target player mills three cards."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mind is a vessel that may be emptied like any other.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. If it's your turn, scry 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {5}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Flitterstep Eidolon can't be blocked. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Floodtide Serpent can't attack unless you return an enchantment you control to its owner's hand. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pray to Thassa for what? A bigger monster to eat it? A wave that can wash it away? What then?" - Lindos, merchant of Meletis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power less than the number of Islands you control can't block Kraken of the Straits.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thassa felt no need to punish the sailors for their folly in crossing the straits. The kraken would do it for her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Meletis Astronomer, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Mindreaver, exile the top three cards of target player's library. {U}{U}, Sacrifice Mindreaver: Counter target spell with the same name as a card exiled with Mindreaver.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature or Aura spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who incur Thassa's anger will be swallowed whole by her waves, or torn asunder by her bident." - Thrasios, triton hero

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {4}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is Thassa's. I could not sway him." - Kiora

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Scry 1, then draw a card." (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may exchange control of Perplexing Chimera and that spell. If you do, you may choose new targets for the spell. (If the spell becomes a permanent, you control that permanent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the geometries of the world collapse, a master of the Æther can harvest power beyond comprehending.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Tribute 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put three +1/+1 counters on it.) When Siren of the Fanged Coast enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, gain control of target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Inspired - Whenever Sphinx's Disciple becomes untapped, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few dare to brave the Dakra Isles. Those who return are forever changed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Stratus Walk enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter how big and strong you are, the sea is bigger and stronger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To resist Thassa is to deny the rising tide.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tromokratis has hexproof unless it's attacking or blocking. Tromokratis can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls block it. (If any creature that player controls doesn't block this creature, it can't be blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Put Vortex Elemental and each creature blocking or blocked by it on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle. {3}{U}{U}: Target creature blocks Vortex Elemental this turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can see why this appeals to Thassa." - Kiora

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have deathtouch. Creatures your opponents control lose deathtouch and can't have or gain deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She sees mortals not as they wish to be, but as what they will become.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Ashiok's Adept, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every nightmare is a caged bird that yearns to be set free." - Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some poisons enter through the blood. Some are ingested. Some are inhaled. All ways through which mortals draw strength are paths for poison." - Agathe, priest of Pharika

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not an arrow loosed, javelin thrown, nor sword raised. None were needed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {B}, Tap another untapped creature you control: Black Oak of Odunos gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phenax promised the newly dead souls they would be spared from Erebos. In this, he did not lie.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice X other creatures: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. {5}{B}{B}: Put Champion of Stray Souls on top of your library from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{1}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Priests of Erebos give an occasional reminder to mortals who have forgotten their mortality.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sad truth is that the whip of Erebos is long enough to wrap around all our throats." - Perisophia the philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {B}, Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Eater of Hope. {2}{B}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gods can be appeased. Demons, however . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If it's a Cyclops, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One chance. One throw. One perfect hit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Fate Unraveler deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never forget that the life you've built can be undone by a single loose thread." - Perisophia the philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains indestructible. If it's your turn, scry 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Felhide Brawler can't block unless you control another Minotaur.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Burial rites among the Felhide minotaurs involve devouring those who fell in battle, to remove their shame from memory and to fuel the survivors' revenge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Inspired - Whenever Forlorn Pseudamma becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie enchantment creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More children taken. This is an evil we will track without mercy." - Anthousa of Setessa

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Forsaken Drifters dies, mill four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is a terrible thing when the path of the Returned leads them back to the Underworld.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Create a Gold token. (It's an artifact with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merchants of the Underworld trade in coins of clay. Gold serves another purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Grisly Transformation enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has intimidate. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {3}{B}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A favorite of Erebos, for it has sent many to the Underworld.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Regenerate it. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat. Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A servant of Pharika must know countless balms that heal and soothe - and countless more that do the opposite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {4}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A body Returned, a soul still lost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Odunos River Trawler enters the battlefield, return target enchantment creature card from your graveyard to your hand. {W}, Sacrifice Odunos River Trawler: Return target enchantment creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever Pain Seer becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every twitching nerve and pulsing vein carries a message, discernible with the right tools.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever Servant of Tymaret becomes untapped, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. {2}{B}: Regenerate Servant of Tymaret.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life is most precious to those who have already lost it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When Shrike Harpy enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, target opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {3}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Whenever Spiteful Returned or enchanted creature attacks, defending player loses 2 life. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever Warchanter of Mogis becomes untapped, target creature you control gains intimidate until end of turn. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Proud Alkmenos, who would not bow to Erebos in death, is now bowed by his own hubris for all eternity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Conscriptor, gain control of another target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have trample. Creatures your opponents control lose trample and can't have or gain trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did Purphoros bless Maikal because of his rage? Or did Maikal's rage blossom after he'd been blessed? Only the gods know." - Eocles, oracle of Purphoros

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bolt of Keranos deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The breakthroughs granted by Keranos, god of epiphany, can be surprisingly literal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Champion armed herself to face the cyclops, heedless of her companions' despair. "How will you defeat it with only one spear?" asked young Althemone. The Champion raised her weapon. "It has but one eye." - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Meletis, certain oracles are trained to be divine lightning rods, receiving countless visions in an instant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {2}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) {R}: Everflame Eidolon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If it's an Aura, enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn instead. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is unwise to insult the god of the forge. It is also unwise to stand near anyone else who has insulted him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fated Conflagration deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If it's your turn, scry 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{2}{R}: Target creature can't block this creature this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Purphoros is god of creation and destruction, which makes him the most creatively destructive god in the pantheon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever Felhide Spiritbinder becomes untapped, you may pay {1}{R}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of another target creature, except it's an enchantment in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When Flame-Wreathed Phoenix enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, return it to its owner's hand."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{R}: Forgestoker Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this combat. Activate only if Forgestoker Dragon is attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Akroans fashion their helms to honor the dragons, not to protect against them, as that would be of little help.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Impetuous Sunchaser attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will soar higher than the walls of Akros! Higher than the clouds! Higher than Heliod himself!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever Kragma Butcher becomes untapped, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Minotaurs go into battle hungry. The first sight of their enemies' blood sends them into a flesh-eating rage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the motes of rain that join to make the thundercloud. The power of the storm god surges through us!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {1}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When Oracle of Bones enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When Pharagax Giant enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, Pharagax Giant deals 5 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pinnacle of Rage deals 3 damage to each of two targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mount Sulano erupted not in magma but in anger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Reckless Reveler: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gods of Theros are born of the expectations and beliefs of mortals. If I have found godhood, what does that say about their true desires?" - Xenagos, god of revels

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plidius wagered that Arissa couldn't kill a chimera with her javelins alone. She proved him wrong in a way everyone could see for days to come.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage to an opponent, Satyr Firedancer deals that much damage to target creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His heart, the coal; his eye, the spark; his hand, the whirling flame.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Inspired - Whenever Satyr Nyx-Smith becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, create a 3/1 red Elemental enchantment creature token with haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scouring Sands deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Purphoros cleans the ashes from his forge, entire cities vanish.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Searing Blood deals 2 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, Searing Blood deals 3 damage to the creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Purphoros's blessing: sometimes a boon, sometimes a bane. Always ablaze.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {1}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A prayer answered by Keranos is clear for all to witness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Tribute 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put three +1/+1 counters on it.) When Thunder Brute enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is your devotion to red. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Starting with you, each player separates all permanents they control into three piles. Then each player chooses one of their piles at random and sacrifices those permanents. (Piles can be empty.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have hexproof. Creatures your opponents control lose hexproof and can't have or gain hexproof.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite its fearsome stature, it is as elusive as a shadow, circling round to stalk those who presume to hunt it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the hierarchies of nature were determined by ferocity alone, the badger would be lord of the beasts." - Anthousa of Setessa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play lands from the top of your library. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunt without Nylea's leave and you may find yourself the next quarry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 3/3 green Centaur enchantment creature tokens. If it's your turn, scry 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach {3}{B}: Graverobber Spider gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cloaks woven from its webs are durable and waterproof but said to bring on nightmares.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of Leina Tower, you may pay {X}. If you do, put X +1/+1 counters on Hero of Leina Tower.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You cannot achieve greatness if its seed has not already been planted in your heart."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To be counted among the warriors of Setessa's Leina Tower, you must not fear death, only failure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Karametra's Favor enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The harvest god's cornucopia contains the fruits of the fields, the forest, and beyond.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The false god Xenagos treats the whole world as his rollick site. If his whims are left unchecked, Theros will be reduced to rubble and ashes." - Elspeth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Fates tried to cut her string but found the thread had turned to iron.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tribute 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put three +1/+1 counters on it.) When Nessian Demolok enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, destroy target noncreature permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tribute 6 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put six +1/+1 counters on it.) When Nessian Wilds Ravager enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, you may have Nessian Wilds Ravager fight another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {5}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) All creatures able to block Noble Quarry or enchanted creature do so. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {4}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Shuffle, then scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever Pheres-Band Raiders becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, create a 3/3 green Centaur enchantment creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who can deny the call to battle when it sings in our blood?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspired - Whenever Pheres-Band Tromper becomes untapped, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trompers are the most feared warriors of the Pheres Band. Anger is their lifeblood. It sustains them and gives them purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Raised by Wolves enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Wolf you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Satyr Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first satyr to wake after a revel must search for the site of the next one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Scourge of Skola Vale enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a number of +1/+1 counters on Scourge of Skola Vale equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Setessan Oathsworn, put two +1/+1 counters on Setessan Oathsworn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Setessa is not the city of my birth, but it is the place I fight for, and the place I'm willing to die for. Does that not make it my home?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Setessan Starbreaker enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Aura.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who says you cannot touch the stars?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skyreaping deals damage to each creature with flying equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tribute 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put three +1/+1 counters on it.) When Snake of the Golden Grove enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some fruits are best left ungathered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The girl who would become the Champion of the Sun hacked furiously at the practice dummy. At last she stopped, breathing heavily, and looked up at her instructor. "So much anger," said the centaur. "I will teach you the ways of war, child. But first you must make peace with yourself." - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target artifact or enchantment. Its owner shuffles it into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thaumaturges of Theros have learned to weave their magic into the world around them, but it can be pulled apart strand by strand.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {2}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, lifelink Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, and lifelink.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to white and blue is less than seven, Ephara isn't a creature. At the beginning of each upkeep, if you had another creature enter the battlefield under your control last turn, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Ephara's Enlightenment enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature. Enchanted creature has flying. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Ephara's Enlightenment to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Tribute 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put a +1/+1 counter on it.) When Fanatic of Xenagos enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to green and white is less than seven, Karametra isn't a creature. Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls. −1: Draw a card. You may play an additional land this turn. −5: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She may call herself Kiora but I believe she is Thassa, the embodiment of the sea and empress of the depths."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to black and red is less than seven, Mogis isn't a creature. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Mogis deals 2 damage to that player unless they sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to blue and black is less than seven, Phenax isn't a creature. Creatures you control have "{T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is this creature's toughness."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Minotaur spells you cast cost {B}{R} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you cast a Minotaur spell with mana cost {2}{R}, it costs {2} to cast.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strength of the people comes from the land. And the bounty of the land comes from Karametra.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Inspired - Whenever Siren of the Silent Song becomes untapped, each opponent discards a card, then each opponent mills a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to red and green is less than seven, Xenagos isn't a creature. At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains haste and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Astral Cornucopia enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color for each charge counter on Astral Cornucopia.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You slew the gorgon? Show me." - King Igalus, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each legendary creature you control gets +1/+1 for each other legendary creature you control. {X}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may reveal a legendary creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender As long as Pillar of War is enchanted, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just because a temple has no guards doesn't mean it's undefended.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has "{2}, {T}: Tap target creature." Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A siren once tried to steal it out of jealousy but was caught by the song of its strings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The music is in the drum. I simply coax it out to be heard."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Malice enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Malice enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Plenty enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Plenty enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.
